jailVaccineData.Notes: Lara: Left VM with Warden Josie: 3/23 medical said that they have submitted everything to the state and are waiting on the vaccinations, but inmates don't qualify yet. 4/16 left message with warden
Lara: Spoke with Amelia, Warden's assistant - claimed we needed to ask for that information via RTK next time - want all requests submitted via email (https://www.alleghenycounty.us/jail/index.aspx)

Josie: Asked if I could verify that I am with PPS, told me that I wasn't on the list of PPS people and that the warden said she could not answer any of my questions, I asked if I should file a right to know and she didn't know what that was. 3/23 called back told that the warden said they wouldn't speak to me unless my name was on the OV list | Lara: Left message with Kelsey

jailVaccineData.IF NO: When do you plan to start vaccina: Have not recieved any information on when they will get the vaccine
jailVaccineData.Notes: Josie: Called, got transferred to Warden, didn't pick up left a message 3/22. 3/23 Called back, have not recieved vaccine because they are 1-B. 4/16 Got transferred to warden, left a vm

Josie: 3/19 left a message. 3/22 called records, then was transferred to warden. They do not have a plan to start vaccine, there are a few members of staff who have recieved vaccine (not from facility) warden could not give a number, also said they have not recieved any instruction from the state on inmate vaccination

jailVaccineData.IF NO: When do you plan to start vaccina: Have not recieved any information on when they will recieve the vaccine
jailVaccineData.Notes: Josie: Tried to call medical, was supposed to be transferred to an attendent, got hung up on 3/19 Called medical again, answered some questions, said I should email sesmith@countyofberks.com

Josie: Medical wrote down the questions and said they would not answer now, but would pass them to the warden who will maybe call back. 3/23 Told they have not recieved vaccines yet but will be offering financial incentive to staff who get vaccinated
Josie: talked to deputy warden, he was helpful but said he did not have all the answers. Answered what he could, but told me to call back tomorrow when warden was on duty. His extention is 5002

Josie: 3/22 Didn't answer, left a message. 3/23 told they were "not permitted to release that information" transferred to administration, no answer, left a message | Lara: told me the same thing, transferred me to admin and I left a message with Michelle

Lara: Spoke with Warden Demore, very helpful. Butler Co. Hospital made it available to all staff that wanted it (120 staff) only 1/5 got it. Waiting on direction from county before vaccinating inmates.
Josie: Left a message, 3/19. Got a call back, said they were trying to obtain vaccines, tenitively scheduled for week of 3/22 or 3/29

Josie: Called warden's office. Said that some staff has recieved the vaccine, but not from facility. I got transferred to Deputy warden who did not answer and left a message 3/22. Called medical, woman that answered told me there was no plan

Lara: Spoke with Warden, frustrated with State Dept. of Health. Was told that county jails could no longer sign up for vaccine slots. Offered it to all staff, but not everyone was able to get vaccinated. Working with Prime Care to try to get inmates vaccinated.

Josie: 3/22 Transferred to director of inmate services. Didn't pick up, left a message. 3/23 Spoke to medical department, told that they didn't know anything about the vaccine. Asked for my info so that someone who was "more knowledgeable" could get back to me
Josie: Called medical office "We do not do the vaccine here" I asked if there was any plan in place to start vaccines "That is up to a doctor, we have not discussed it"
Kyra: Inquired about obtaining vaccines for inmates but are unable to store them
Lara: Gave a guess as to how many staff members vaccinated - not sure as to accuracy of this number
Kyra: Spoke with medical who frowarded me to Shawn(a) Palmer and left a message
Kyra: Provider has not ben able to get vaccines yet

jailVaccineData.IF NO: When do you plan to start vaccina: Staff were directed to local hospitals in coordination with the DOH to get vaccinated.
jailVaccineData.Notes: Kyra: Waiting for the DOH to distribute vaccine to us.

jailVaccineData.IF NO: When do you plan to start vaccina: Staff was informed that vaccines are locally availible

jailVaccineData.Notes: Kyra: Unable to get through to anyone in the medcial department

jailVaccineData.IF NO: When do you plan to start vaccina: Coordinating with Harrisburg to put a plan in place to start vaccinations

jailVaccineData.Notes: Lara: Lionel Pierre in Records Office - not doing vaccinations on site, staff has option to go into the community - Working daily to try to obatin vaccines for inmates, when it will be available is entirely up to DOH/PEMA
Kyra: Left a message with the warden
Kyra: Spoke with someone who said the warden was busy and to call back another time

jailVaccineData.IF NO: When do you plan to start vaccina: Whenever they are able to obtain vaccines

jailVaccineData.Notes: Kyra: Told to contact Primecare medical?
Grace: Asked me to call back, calling back on Monday (3/29)
Grace: Line immediately began beeping and hung up automatically (tried twice)
Grace: Left a message for Rhonda, no call back
Grace: Medical told me no one has received the vaccine and they have no timeline of when the vaccine will be made available to them
Grace: Left a message for Amanda, no call back
Grace: Left a message with Medical, no call back

Grace: Spoke with someone in Medical who referred me to Chief Nursing Supervisor (they have not started vaccinating and there is no tentative date to start at the moment) (call back Monday (3/29) at 570-329-4064)
Grace: Asked me to call back, calling back on Monday (3/29)

Lara: Bruce Herdman contacted - will be reporting numbers early next week | Staff offered vaccine Jan. 4th and inmates Jan. 25th | 50% acceptance rate among incarcerated folks, says they can't caluculate refusual rate among staff due to scheduling
Note: Left a VM with medical dept. Did not start vaccinating staff yet
Note: Left VM with deputy warden
Note: Left VM with medical dept

Note: Deputy warden said they are in the planning stages of getting more vaccines available for staff and inmates by working with medical dept and local hospitals to get proper refigeration for vaccines  as well
Note: He only offered estimates and not exact numbers. Started back in early January
Note: Medical department only offered estimate of how many staff vaccinated. "We will start vaccinating inmates when we get vaccines."
Note: Warden said he was told they are supposed to begin by April 1, but he is unsure if this is actually going to happen on that date.
Note: Medical dept only offered estimates. Said at least 50-75% of staff vaccinated and it was their choice. Unsure when inmates are going to be vaccinated

Note: Said he is unsure exact percentage of staff vaccinated and said something about HIPAA laws? In regard to when inmates are going to be vaccinated he said "when the CDC and health dept. says we can."
Note: Left VM with medical dept.
Note: Left VM with medical dept.

Note: Was transferred to the medical dept and the guy who picked up the phone was very rude. He said "I just have one question for you. Who is Noah Barth?" (I called from Noah's office phone) so I said I was calling from Prison Society and he said "well you have no way of proving that to me and I do not want to give out information over the phone. What number are you calling from?" Got no info out of him | Lara: Spoke with Dept. Warden Kline, very nice, super helpful (recommend calling him instead)  - says he is unable to disclose the private health information of employees

Note: Deputy warden said the jail is on a waiting list for vaccines to become available and all of the staff signed up. Also waiting for vaccines to be avaiable for inmates but does not have a time-frame of when this will happen. He said that some of the staff went and got vaccinated on their own time.
jailVaccineData.Staff vaccinated?: Some staff got vaccinated on their own time
